thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com
thread.title: Liz from CT
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Liz from CT

author: Liz from CT
title: Liz from CT
text: I have bought salmon from Vital Choice for years. Recently tried halibut. Totally satisfied.Their fish oil capsules are superior to prescription grade. Priced reasonably. Some reviews said they were hard to swallow. They are a somewhat large. The trick is to take with a mouthful of water, followed by another.
